name: fish
description: - **Authentication**: User registration, login, and role-based access control. - **Product Management**: CRUD operations for products, including image uploads. - **Category Management**: CRUD operations for product categories. - **User Management**: Admin interface for managing users and roles. - **Order & Reservation System**: (In progress) Manage orders and reservations. - **Communication System**: (In progress) Real-time messaging and notifications. - **Veterinary Features**: (In progress) Certificate and health inspection management.
